UNIVERSAL FIT KIT – A total of 620pcs push rivets including 16 most popular car clip fastener kits, suitable for OEM replacement of 6-10mm hole size. Don’t worry about lost or damaged body fasteners. All the necessary retainers for exact replacement of the old and broken retainer.
IMPACT RESISTANT CAR CLIPS – It’s made of durable nylon fiber material, not easy to break or deform. Excellent workmanship is necessary to condition for product reliability, stability, and long-term use, We check the products again before shipping for you.
TOUGH FASTENER REMOVER TOOLS – 1 Fastener remover and 4 different size car panel removers made of Durable Plastic and Metal material, allow you to quickly and easily remove car door panels and upholstery clips without causing damage to them. Easy access into confined areas.
EASY TO USE – Push in type, Just fix it to its mounting point and you’re done, Rivet post pressure expands legs for fast and tight fastening. Simple to install without complicated installation steps. Widely used in car panel, door trim, bumper and fender for GM Ford Toyota Honda Chrysler etc.
PACKAGE LIST – The auto body clip kit includes 620 Pcs bumper retainer clips, 1 plastic box, 5 durable fastener removal tools, 10 plastic cable ties. It allows to freely DIY your vehicle accessories at anytime you wanted. It is definitely cheaper than going to the auto parts store.

From the brand

GARTOL Gardening Tools

Not sure how to get your GARTOL product to work correctly?

Contact our friendly support team for quick solutions.

The GARTOL is a 20 years old and professional brand in the United States. Our products are famous for high quality. We are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of garden tools comprising lopper, hedge shears, grass shears, hand pruners, hand saw, cultivator, rake, flower stand, and so on. All the products are sold to many countries and areas, including Europe, the USA, Australia, and East-south Asia.

Please let us know if you are interested.

GARTOL Miter Shears

GARTOL Garden Lopper

Garden Hose Holder

Garden Tool

Pump Sprayer,Plant Caddy

Ladies Sexy Stockings

Pump sprayer, Pruning shears

GARTOL Tools

ANTIRUST SK 5 STEEL BLADE Sharp sturdy blade, ideal for cutting chamfer, round molds, trunking and pvc strips, rubber gaskets, molding and weatherstrip.
HIGH-PRECISION ENGRAVING SCALE Clear and precise scale surface to help you cut accurately. Adjustable slider on the scale surface allows for a 45°-135°cutting angle, free to cut the trunking to different shape when needed.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLE Strong and durable integrated handle is made of aluminum alloy and PPC anti-skid cover. Comfortable grip no hand fatigue for long-term use.
TURN CLASP SAFETY LOCK The turn clasp closure is easy to close and open, safe and convenient, you no need to worry about being accidentally scratched by the blade.
REPLACEABLE BLADE This trunking scissors set includes additional Spare Sharp heavy duty replaceable blade. Notice this shear is not suitable for cutting metal and stainless steel.

Have you ever had problems measuring your material only to realize it is slightly off and have to redo the entire thing?

If you’ve ever installed small moldings, such as quarter round, you’ll immediately recognize the utility of these miter shears.

GARTOL miter shears are perfect for all your installation needs to save you TIME. Use for cutting time trim, PVC piping, quarter round, tack strip, and other light materials.

Toggle to adjust the angle you want

The basic shear has a jaw with right and left 45° fences, and incised markings for 60°, 75°, 90°, 105°, 120°and 135°. Free to cut the trunking to a different shape when needed.

Don’t waste time measuring and cutting when you can do both at the same time with our Miter Cutters.

Read more

Multi-function angle shears great for cutting chamfer, shoe molding, trunking and wood parts for carpet.

Handy for odd trimming jobs, rubber plastic edge strip, PVC trunking corner, PVC edge strip, semi-circular strip, thin wooden splicing, and so on.

Snipping dowel and rods and all those other tasks too hard for scissors, yet too small for a saw. These multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.

Works effectively with softwoods up to 3/4″ in size.

Read more

The set includes additional spare sharp, heavy-duty replaceable blade

Our miter cutter has 2 Sk-5 steel blades, non-slip ergonomically designed handle, high-precision engraving scale, clasp safety lock.

  1. Premium stainless steel blade comes ready to take on any job, including cutting PVC, piping, wood trim, wires, or other similar materials without pulling out big materials.
  2. Whether you’re a handy person looking for a new tool or a professional with specific needs, these multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.
  3. Our tools come with a full steel frame and ergonomic rubber soles that provide great traction and comfort to help the hand when applying pressure on the cutter.
  4. Our pre-attached angled reference saves you a load of time and the hassle of measuring the angle trying to cut. Helps with accuracy and efficiency for your angle measuring needs

Read more

NOT SATISFIED?

If you are not completely happy please get in touch with us before leaving negative feedback. We can’t help you if you don’t let us know for assistance.

Please let us know via your Amazon order or our Amazon store. Enjoy GARTOL’s 1-year after-sales policy.

Thank you!

From the brand

Games the Family Will Love

At Brybelly we love games, and we love to share games. Build better family game nights with beloved classics and fun new titles.

Shop Favorites & New Launches

How did we get our start?

In 2005 Brybelly was founded like all great companies: in a garage. What began as selling poker chips at flea markets has become a medium-sized Indiana business employing nearly 50 hoosiers.

What makes our products unique?

A Brybelly game tries to pack in extra value. If there’s a similar product, we want to include more stuff. If it’s a familiar game, we want to add fun extra rules for more replay value. If a deck of cards is all you need to play a game, we want to make that deck special.

Why do we love what we do?

Games are fun! And we think that fun can be contagious.

Old Favorites with Flair

Classic Games Given New Life

Games from Across the Globe

Looking for even more? We’ve probably got it! We’re always adding new and exciting games and experiences to our growing catalog.

Whether its board games, card games, dice games, even favorite casino games, gaming is our passion and we’re always looking to share with you our next big new thing. So keep your peepers peeled!

SHOOT THE POOP! Get wild with Shoot the Poop, a hilarious game for the whole family and makes perfect white elephant gifts for adults
NO PLUMBING REQUIRED: Includes a talking Tank the Toilet who’s flush with funny jokes, 12 plastic poop toys, and 2 launchers
POWER POOPER: This wild family game requires 2 AAA batteries to help Tank make crazy flushing sounds
THE FAMILY THAT POOPS TOGETHER: Enjoy some family toilet humor! Shoot the Poop is a great for 2 players kids games ages 4-8, 8-12+
HANDFUL OF POOP: Get launching with a fast-paced family dexterity game. Don’t get caught with your hands full of poo! Be the first to shoot your shot, and don’t forget to flush

Have a Poopy Day

Hi folks, meet Tank! He’s the talking toilet who loves to play. It’s up to you and one other player to get your fun flingers and form a doo-doo duo! Be the first player to launch all six of your poopy projectiles into Tank’s mouth. Powered by two AAA batteries, Tank will cheer you on as you take aim, ready, and fire away! This family dexterity game helps children develop fine motor skills, and it’s finished in a flash. Sink your last floater and win the game! Don’t forget to flush! When you pull Tank’s lever, he’ll always have something to say.

Read more

Why You’ll Love It

Shoot the Poop is a fast-playing game of reflex and humor. Play with 1 child or friend for some fun and a little bit of toilet humor. Age 5+, 2 players. Great for Christmas and White Elephant gifts and Birthday Presents from that crazy uncle.

Read more



Don’t Be a Donkey!
Cat-Tasrophe!
Irr-Elephant!
Honeycomb Hacov!
Looking for more family-friendly games from Brybelly? HEE-HAW! No pins, tails, or blindfolds required for this refreshing donkey game! Me-WOW! Save the kitty cat from the top of the tree in this classic and challenging kids dexterity game! More than an Earful! Place the platform, put the elephant in the right place, and try to keep it balanced! Sticky Situation! Use your paws to poke out pieces of honeycombs, snatching up delicious gobs of honey to munch for lunch!

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:50 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Price: $16.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

– FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS for Car Guys Plastic Restorer –

QUESTION: Is this only for interior and exterior automotive surfaces? ANSWER: No! This can be used for a variety of applications such as a cars bumper, a jeep or chevy avalanche truck that has tons of plastic, plus your RV or motorcycle! Also has marine applications for things such as the vinyl seats on your boat! Works GREAT for any indoor or outdoor accessories or home restoration projects such as shutters, furniture and siding. Looks like just an auto product, but this special formula will bring ANYTHING made from plastic, vinyl or rubber back to life!

QUESTION: Is this a dye and is it only for black material? ANSWER: No this is not a dye! It will restore the material back to whatever its original color was. Works excellent to bring black back and if you have faded grey trim it will darken it back to its original shine and finish.

QUESTION: Does this contain UV protection? ANSWER: Yes! This acts like a sealant by leaving a durable UV protectant guard to shield away harmful UV rays that cause fading, browning and cracking.

QUESTION: What kind of prep work or after care is involved, is it easy to use? ANSWER: This product is extremely easy to use! Simply clean the surface using CarGuys Super Cleaner spray or any other type of cleaner that effectively wipes and cleans off any old dressings, oil and dirt. Apply a small amount onto our kits included applicator pad and wipe onto the surface. After 10-15 minutes buff down any excess product and you’re done! In the future, simply clean treated surfaces with regular soap and water.

[[ Complete Kit Includes: (1) Foam Applicator Pad. ]]

Description
Safe & Effective Multi-Surface Cleaner Restore anything made from Plastic, Rubber, or Vinyl Acid Free & pH Balanced Wheel and Tire Cleaner Easy to use, no sling Tire Shine Spray Sealant infused with Carnauba Wax High Gloss Synthetic Paint Sealant

No Harmful Chemicals

CarGuys’ Commitment to Safety

At CarGuys, we care about traffic safety. Through our sponsorship of We Save Lives, we have the opportunity to ensure the safety of others by increasing awareness of highway safety issues and to influence highway safety policy at the local, state and national levels. We are committed to helping We Save Lives change attitudes about drunk, drugged and distracted driving and promote responsible driving that saves lives.

Results That Last! – Are you tired of wasting time and money on plastic restorers that claim to last long? They always look great in the beginning.. only to fade after a few days, or maybe a month if it’s decent! Our product will renew, seal and protect any interior/exterior surface and WILL LAST.. for several MONTHS! Stop purchasing cheap junk with false claims, our product will out last all of them!
Survives Rain! – Does this sound familiar? You spent all that time perfectly applying a new product and it looks great! Wow, you finally found the one! BUT… after the first rain-fall you look in disgust at yet another crappy product that left ugly streaks down the side of your beautiful vehicle… STOP THE MADNESS! Our product repels water and stays looking good for several months! Never again will you feel that disappointment!
No More Oily Mess! – Do you hate all the oily, greasy gel dressing products that stay wet and never fully dry? That describes about 90% of the plastic and trim restorers on the market today! Well lucky you! We made a product that will restore and leave a great finish, but more importantly, it will completely dry to the touch! No more ruining your detailing towels and supplies with cheap oil based products!
Why choose CAR GUYS? – We Care About Quality! Our products are made with the latest advancements in science, using the best equipment available. This helps us make consistently high quality products that always work great! Every formula we make is mixed and bottled, in the USA, by hard working Americans!
We Care About Customer Satisfaction! – We’re Not Happy, If You’re Not Happy! If you’re not happy with our product, for ANY REASON at all, get in contact with CAR GUYS anytime after your purchase, and we’ll be happy to provide a full refund. So what are you waiting for?! — Click ‘Add to Cart’ Now!

– FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS for Car Guys Plastic Restorer –

QUESTION: Is this only for interior and exterior automotive surfaces? ANSWER: No! This can be used for a variety of applications such as a cars bumper, a jeep or chevy avalanche truck that has tons of plastic, plus your RV or motorcycle! Also has marine applications for things such as the vinyl seats on your boat! Works GREAT for any indoor or outdoor accessories or home restoration projects such as shutters, furniture and siding. Looks like just an auto product, but this special formula will bring ANYTHING made from plastic, vinyl or rubber back to life!

QUESTION: Is this a dye and is it only for black material? ANSWER: No this is not a dye! It will restore the material back to whatever its original color was. Works excellent to bring black back and if you have faded grey trim it will darken it back to its original shine and finish.

QUESTION: Does this contain UV protection? ANSWER: Yes! This acts like a sealant by leaving a durable UV protectant guard to shield away harmful UV rays that cause fading, browning and cracking.

QUESTION: What kind of prep work or after care is involved, is it easy to use? ANSWER: This product is extremely easy to use! Simply clean the surface using CarGuys Super Cleaner spray or any other type of cleaner that effectively wipes and cleans off any old dressings, oil and dirt. Apply a small amount onto our kits included applicator pad and wipe onto the surface. After 10-15 minutes buff down any excess product and you’re done! In the future, simply clean treated surfaces with regular soap and water.

From the brand

Vtopmart is dedicated to creating a better home life for every family.

Our Vision:

To pursue a better life and enjoy it, we are committed to providing various well-designed, high-quality, practically household products with fashionable concepts and innovative design to make your home full of warmth and love.

Vtopmart Drawer Organizer

Explore More Categories

Fit Multi Occasions

Make Everything Organized —- These clear versatile drawer dividers trays are perfect for any place in your home. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity / bathroom / kitchen / office drawers, ideal for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, jewelry, office supplies, craft supplies, utensils, etc.
Combination of 4 Different Sizes —- One set includes 25pcs storage bins in 4 different sizes, which makes you can customize combinations to store items and organize drawer for your specific needs. Includes: 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs), 9 x 3x 2 inches(6pcs), 6 x 3 x 2 inches(8pcs), 3 x 3 x 2 inches(8cps).
Non-Slip and Durable —- Extra 200pcs silicone pads are included, just stick them on the bottom of the plastic trays for non-slip. Made of durable and clear plastic, so you can see what’s in it without digging around or making a mess, help you get a neat lifestyle.
Stackable Design —- Organize all your items and then stack these bins into one other, that will save much space especially when you have a narrow drawer. Use these trays to separate your messy drawer, you will find it’s so easy to keep things neat and tidy.
Easy to Clean —- Our desk drawer storage bins are easy to be wiped clean with a damp cloth and perfect for keeping everything in its place. Convenient for use in your daily life, make everything look beautiful and better organized.

Read more

4 Size Combination

Variety of sizes help make the organization of different items more flexible and easier. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity, bathroom, kitchen and office drawers

Non-Slip Design

Silicone pads at the bottom of the bin prevent the box from moving when dragging the drawer, always keep things in their own place.

Built to Last

Made of durable and transparent plastic, built to last. Clear bins make you can see everything in them when pulling a stack of them out of a drawer.

Package Include:

  • 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs)
  • 9 x 3x 2 inches (6pcs)
  • 6 x 3 x 2 inches (8pcs)
  • 3 x 3 x 2 inches (8cps)

Read more

Multi Purpose

Organize Makeup

Fit perfectly for your vanity drawer, for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, nail polish, and more.

Organize Office Supplies

Convenient for storing small items such as pencils, stationery and so on, helping you to save space. Make your desk look more neatly and cleanly.

Organize Kitchen Utensils

Ideal for organizing forks, spoons, steak knives in your kitchen, allow you to keep everything handy for meal prep and cooking.

Package content: you will receive 36 pieces of black inflatable stakes, the sufficient quantity can well meet your needs and replacements at various occasions, providing convenience for your life
Universal size: the size of each plastic inflatable stake is about 7×0.6×1.1 inch/18cm×1.6×2.8 cm, proper in size, suitable for most tent, besides, they are lightweight and portable, easy to carry and store
Premium material: these inflatable stakes are made of high quality pp plastic, sturdy and durable, reliable and excellent, not easy to break and rust, can be used for a long time
Easy to use: it is easy for you to use the plastic inflatable stakes, firstly, you need to insert the stake into the ground at an angle, and then tie one end of the rope to the stake and fix the other end on the inflatable film, convenient and practical
Extensive uses: these inflatable stakes can be used for a variety of festivals, such as Holloween, Christmas and so on; in addition, they are ideal for inflatable toys, tents, etc., creating a wonderful scene for you
